General.Name: Izmir Demir Celik Sanayi AS
General.Description: Izmir Demir Çelik Sanayi Anonim Sirketi, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production, marketing, and sale of iron and steel in Turkey and internationally. It is also involved in the energy production and trading; and ship production and operation activities, as well as provision of port and harbor services. The company was incorporated in 1975 and is based in Izmir, Turkey. Izmir Demir Çelik Sanayi Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Sahin Koc Celik Sanayi A.S.
General.Address: Sair Esref Bulvari No: 23, Izmir, Turkey, 35210
